languages.text: "Пока они не шепчут прирезать нас всех во сне, поводов для беспокойства не вижу".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Heinrix's first quest (to deal with a corrupted cogitator on Kiava Gamma)
Idira: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

languages.text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Heinrix's first quest (to deal with a corrupted cogitator on Kiava Gamma)
Idira: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."
languages.original_text: "Пока они не шепчут прирезать нас всех во сне, поводов для беспокойства не вижу".

traits.locale_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."
"As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

languages.text: 「彼らが俺たちの寝込みを襲って喉をかき切れと言ったのでなければ、心配する理由はないだろう」
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らが俺たちの寝込みを襲って喉をかき切れと言ったのでなければ、心配する理由はないだろう」

languages.text: "Solange sie Euch nicht sagen, Ihr sollt uns im Schlaf die Kehle durchschneiden, sehe ich keinen Anlass zur Besorgnis."
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: "Solange sie Euch nicht sagen, Ihr sollt uns im Schlaf die Kehle durchschneiden, sehe ich keinen Anlass zur Besorgnis."

languages.text: «Mientras no le digan que nos rebane el pescuezo mientras dormimos, no veo motivos para preocuparnos».
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras no le digan que nos rebane el pescuezo mientras dormimos, no veo motivos para preocuparnos».

languages.text: “只要那些声音没教唆你趁我们睡觉的时候抹了我们的脖子，我看就没什么好担心的。”
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: “只要那些声音没教唆你趁我们睡觉的时候抹了我们的脖子，我看就没什么好担心的。”

languages.text: "Uykumuzda boğazımızı kesmeni istemedikleri sürece endişelenmek için bir neden göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: "Uykumuzda boğazımızı kesmeni istemedikleri sürece endişelenmek için bir neden göremiyorum."

languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

languages.text: « Tant qu'ils ne vous disent pas de nous trancher la gorge pendant notre sommeil, je ne vois aucune raison de s'inquiéter. »
languages.original_text: "As long as they are not telling you to slit our throats in our sleep, I see no cause for concern."

traits.locale_text: « Tant qu'ils ne vous disent pas de nous trancher la gorge pendant notre sommeil, je ne vois aucune raison de s'inquiéter. »
